TargetName: DEL-03-07: Harness API Baseline in Frontend Runtime

Notes: FACT. Enriched Specification.md REQ-04 states: 'if DEL-03-07 (Harness API Baseline) requires server-side API routes... a custom server approach is likely needed.' Guidance.md C1 restates: 'the bootstrap should choose the simplest viable approach that supports the harness API routes needed by DEL-03-07.' This is a bidirectional coupling: DEL-01-03 is DOWNSTREAM to DEL-03-07 (DEP-01-03-012) and also UPSTREAM from DEL-03-07 for integration-pattern information.
